original_text: I made myself gardens and parks, and planted in them all kinds of fruit trees.
korean_text: 여러 동산과 과원을 만들고 그 가운데에 각종 과목을 심었으며

sentences.original_text: I made myself gardens and parks
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나를 위해 정원과 공원을 만들었다.

sentences.original_text: and planted in them all kinds of fruit trees
